mapper.sql: select menu_id, title, parent_id, order_num, href, target, status, ifnull(perms,'') as perms, icon, create_by, create_time from sys_menu
mapper.select:
select *from sys_user
user_id = #{userId} and password = #{password} and del_flag=0

select *from sys_user
user_id = #{userId} and del_flag=0 and is_disable=0
select r.role_code,r.role_name,r.is_default_role,r.valid_status,r.create_time,r.del_flag from sys_role r,sys_user u WHERE r.del_flag = 0 and u.user_id = #{userId} and r.role_code=u.role_code
select menu_id,open, title, parent_id, order_num, href, target, status, ifnull(perms,'') as perms, icon, create_by, create_time from sys_menu order by parent_id, order_num

select distinct m.menu_id,m.open, m.parent_id, m.title, m.href, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.target, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_code LEFT JOIN sys_role ro on rm.role_id = ro.role_code where ur.user_id = #{userId} order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
select m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
